Garden Edging Rye

We are the local landscape edging experts for Rye. Create timeless, rusty garden borders that withstand the Rye coastal salt air.

Get a Rye Quote

Why Rye Gardens Need Corten

Owning property in Rye means dealing with sandy soils and salt exposure. Timber rots and plastic cracks. Corten steel is the only edging material that improves with age in our coastal climate.

We realize many Rye properties feature native coastal plantings. The rustic orange of Corten steel provides the perfect backdrop for these green-grey palettes.

  • Delivered to Rye Weekly
  • Installation Network in Rye area
  • Suitable for Rye Soil Conditions
